Contact Details: Karen Moore Analysis, Statistics and Research Branch Department for Infrastructure Clarence Court, 10-18 Adelaide Street, Belfast BT2 8GB Tel: 028 9054 0313 (Text relay prefix 18001) E-mail: ASRB@nisra.gov.uk Website: https://www.infrastructure-ni.gov.uk/articles/northern-ireland-transport-statistics
Description: This publication presents information on the road network, public transport and accessible transport in Northern Ireland.
Name: Northern Ireland Transport Statistics
Route from landing page to data: Data on this page identified via a link at top of list under heading Publications. This will link to another page with the latest data, identified on page under heading Documents as two tables in XLS and ODS formats.
Sizing Notes: Small tables with simple strctures but doule tables on one tab. Multiple dimensions with subdimensions and several footnotes.
